dfischer.utils

Class JSONHtmlBasedExtractor

  • java.lang.Object
    • dfischer.utils.JSONHtmlBasedExtractor

  • public class JSONHtmlBasedExtractor
extends java.lang.Object
    class used exclusively to create HTML content from JSON string for easy extraction. It inserts a hyperlink on each value based on given href base so that the value can be extracted by clicking.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Method Detail

      • readAllAsHtml

        public java.lang.String readAllAsHtml()
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        method used to read and update JSON string with hyperlinks to a given 'href' specified by hrefBaseBegin and hrefBaseEnd, query parameters for JSONPath and 'recordedValue'. This method uses Jackson library for deserialization and maintains the original order of objects in string.
        Returns:
        string for HTML printing
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        string value of object

      • getNodeValueToken

        public java.lang.String getNodeValueToken(java.lang.String jsonPath,
                                 int tokenNr,
                                 java.lang.String tokenDelimiterChars,
                                 boolean trim)
        method used to retrieve value of object based on given JSONPath, Token Number, Token Delimiter Character and Trim
        Parameters:
        jsonPath - string specifying JSONPath of object
        tokenNr - integer specifying token number
        tokenDelimiterChars - string specifying token delimiter char
        trim - boolean specifying if resulting value string sholed be trimmed or not
        Returns:
        string
